Field.DisplayName: Basic toughness durability recovery time
Field.Description: This is the basic value of toughness recovery time. (Seconds)

Field.DisplayName: Character event turning animation (90 ° left)
Field.Description: This is a 90 ° left turn animation for the "Character Turn" event.

Field.DisplayName: Character event turning animation (right 90 °)
Field.Description: This is a 90 ° right turn animation for the "Character Turn" event.

Field.DisplayName: Character event turning animation (180 ° left)
Field.Description: This is a 180 ° left turn animation for the "Character Turn" event.

Field.DisplayName: Character event turning animation (right 180 °)
Field.Description: This is a 180 ° right turn animation for the "Character Turn" event.

Field.DisplayName: Character event turning 90 ° Animation start angle
Field.Description: The starting angle of the angle to which the 90 ° swivel animation for the "Character Swirl" event is applied. If the event starts at an angle smaller than this angle, a system turn will occur.

Field.DisplayName: Character event turning 180 ° Animation start angle
Field.Description: The starting angle of the angle to which the 180 ° swivel animation for the "Character Swirl" event is applied.

Field.DisplayName: Stealth attack damage multiplier
Field.Description: Stealth attack damage multiplier

Field.DisplayName: Damage cut rate when the guard is successful when repelled
Field.Description: Damage cut rate when the guard is successful when repelled. Multiply the final damage

Field.DisplayName: Difference angle to start playing NPC conversation animation
Field.Description: This is the difference angle at which the animation playback of the motion during the conversation of the NPC conversation starts.

Field.DisplayName: Difference angle to stop animation playback of NPC conversation
Field.Description: This is the difference angle at which the animation playback of the motion during the conversation of the NPC conversation is stopped.

Field.DisplayName: Distance to create a sign away from a safe position [m]
Field.Description: Distance at which you can create a sign away from the last safe position on your PC [m]

Field.DisplayName: Distance between host and guest where resummoning occurs [m]
Field.Description: Distance between host and guest where resummoning occurs [m]

Field.DisplayName: Distance to notify the guest that they are about to leave the host [m]
Field.Description: Distance [m] to notify the guest that they are about to leave the host. Notify me when I'm farther than this distance.

Field.DisplayName: Distance that allows guests to be re-notified that they are about to leave the host [m]
Field.Description: Distance [m] that allows the guest to be re-notified that they are about to leave the host. Do not re-notify until closer than this distance.

Field.DisplayName: Maximum distance the guest can be away from the host [m]
Field.Description: Maximum distance [m] that a guest can leave the host. If a certain period of time elapses while the distance is longer than this distance, the session will be withdrawn.

Field.DisplayName: Retry area radius_default value (m)
Field.Description: Retry area radius_default value (m). It is used as the default value when the radius and area are not set in the event type "Retry Point" of MapStudio.

Field.DisplayName: Special effect ID that activates when Nemuri items can be acquired
Field.Description: A special effect ID that activates when a Nemuri item can be acquired. TAE flag Used as the default value when not overwriting with "Event> Nemuri item registration".

Field.DisplayName: "Recover below HP maximum" Special effect completion notification Special effect ID
Field.Description: ID of the special effect that notifies that "Recovery below HP maximum" is completed. Mainly used for multi synchronization.

Field.DisplayName: HP Est absorption production SFXID
Field.Description: Absorption effect SFXID when recovering the number of times the HP Est bottle has been used when defeating an intruder

Field.DisplayName: MP Est Absorption Production SFXID
Field.Description: Absorption effect SFXID when recovering the number of times the MP Est bottle has been used when defeating an intruder

Field.DisplayName: Special effect ID for determining the activation of the resurrection special effect
Field.Description: ID of the special effect that notifies that the resurrection special effect has been activated. Mainly used for multi synchronization.

Field.Description: Buddy Summoning_Initial Range Special Effect ID_For Buddy

Field.DisplayName: Time from the start of est absorption SFX playback to the start of est addition processing
Field.Description: Time from the start of est absorption SFX playback to the start of est addition processing

Field.Description: Correction value of the amount of soul acquired by the host when defeating a normal enemy in multiplayer

Field.DisplayName: Soul correction value acquired when defeating enemies at multi time_cooperative spirit
Field.Description: Correction value of the amount of soul acquired by cooperating spirits when defeating a normal enemy in multiplayer

Field.DisplayName: Soul correction value acquired when defeating the boss at the time of multi _ host

Field.DisplayName: Soul correction value acquired when defeating the boss at the time of multi _ cooperation spirit
Field.Description: Correction value of the amount of soul acquired when the boss is defeated in multiplayer
